sentences.sentence: Oliver Theist, his second novel, came out in 1838 and was very successful.
sentences.translation: 他的第二部小说《奥立弗有神论》于1838年出版，并且非常成功。

sentences.sentence: I am neither antitheist nor theist.
I find it possible to remember English words faster in theist way.
sentences.translation: 我发现用这种方法更快地记英语单词是可能的。
